verses.verse: Now the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> after their number, <WH4557> to wit, the chief <WH7218> fathers <WH1> and captains <WH8269> of thousands <WH505> and hundreds, <WH3967> and their officers <WH7860> that served <WH8334> <WH853> the king <WH4428> in any <WH3605> matter <WH1697> of the courses, <WH4256> which came in <WH935> and went out <WH3318> month by month <WH2320> <WH2320> throughout all <WH3605> the months <WH2320> of the year, <WH8141> of every <WH259> course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand. <WH505>

Over <WH5921> the first <WH7223> course <WH4256> for the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> was Jashobeam <WH3434> the son <WH1121> of Zabdiel: <WH2068> and in <WH5921> his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand. <WH505>
Of <WH4480> the children <WH1121> of Perez <WH6557> was the chief <WH7218> of all <WH3605> the captains <WH8269> of the host <WH6635> for the first <WH7223> month. <WH2320>

And over <WH5921> the course <WH4256> of the second <WH8145> month <WH2320> was Dodai <WH1737> an Ahohite, <WH266> and of his course <WH4256> was Mikloth <WH4732> also the ruler: <WH5057> in <WH5921> his course <WH4256> likewise were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand. <WH505>

The third <WH7992> captain <WH8269> of the host <WH6635> for the third <WH7992> month <WH2320> was Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiada, <WH3077> a chief <WH7218> priest: <WH3548> and in <WH5921> his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand. <WH505>
This <WH1931> is that Benaiah, <WH1141> who was mighty <WH1368> among the thirty, <WH7970> and above <WH5921> the thirty: <WH7970> and in his course <WH4256> was Ammizabad <WH5990> his son. <WH1121>

The fourth <WH7243> captain for the fourth <WH7243> month <WH2320> was Asahel <WH6214> the brother <WH251> of Joab, <WH3097> and Zebadiah <WH2069> his son <WH1121> after <WH310> him: and in <WH5921> his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand. <WH505>

The fifth <WH2549> captain <WH8269> for the fifth <WH2549> month <WH2320> was Shamhuth <WH8049> the Izrahite: <WH3155> and in <WH5921> his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand. <WH505>

The sixth <WH8345> captain for the sixth <WH8345> month <WH2320> was Ira <WH5896> the son <WH1121> of Ikkesh <WH6142> the Tekoite: <WH8621> and in <WH5921> his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand. <WH505>

The seventh <WH7637> captain for the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> was Helez <WH2503> the Pelonite, <WH6397> of <WH4480> the children <WH1121> of Ephraim: <WH669> and in <WH5921> his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand. <WH505>

The eighth <WH8066> captain for the eighth <WH8066> month <WH2320> was Sibbecai <WH5444> the Hushathite, <WH2843> of the Zarhites: <WH2227> and in <WH5921> his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand. <WH505>

The ninth <WH8671> captain for the ninth <WH8671> month <WH2320> was Abiezer <WH44> the Anetothite, <WH6069> of the Benjamites: <WH1145> and in <WH5921> his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand. <WH505>

The tenth <WH6224> captain for the tenth <WH6224> month <WH2320> was Maharai <WH4121> the Netophathite, <WH5200> of the Zarhites: <WH2227> and in <WH5921> his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand. <WH505>

The eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> captain for the eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> month <WH2320> was Benaiah <WH1141> the Pirathonite, <WH6553> of <WH4480> the children <WH1121> of Ephraim: <WH669> and in <WH5921> his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand. <WH505>

The twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> captain for the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> month <WH2320> was Heldai <WH2469> the Netophathite, <WH5200> of Othniel: <WH6274> and in <WH5921> his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand. <WH505>

Furthermore over <WH5921> the tribes <WH7626> of Israel: <WH3478> the ruler <WH5057> of the Reubenites <WH7206> was Eliezer <WH461> the son <WH1121> of Zichri: <WH2147> of the Simeonites, <WH8099> Shephatiah <WH8203> the son <WH1121> of Maachah: <WH4601>
Of the Levites, <WH3881> Hashabiah <WH2811> the son <WH1121> of Kemuel: <WH7055> of the Aaronites, <WH175> Zadok: <WH6659>
Of Judah, <WH3063> Elihu, <WH453> one of the brethren <WH4480> <WH251> of David: <WH1732> of Issachar, <WH3485> Omri <WH6018> the son <WH1121> of Michael: <WH4317>
Of Zebulun, <WH2074> Ishmaiah <WH3460> the son <WH1121> of Obadiah: <WH5662> of Naphtali, <WH5321> Jerimoth <WH3406> the son <WH1121> of Azriel: <WH5837>

Of the children <WH1121> of Ephraim, <WH669> Hoshea <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Azaziah: <WH5812> of the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh, <WH4519> Joel <WH3100> the son <WH1121> of Pedaiah: <WH6305>
Of the half <WH2677> tribe of Manasseh <WH4519> in Gilead, <WH1568> Iddo <WH3035> the son <WH1121> of Zechariah: <WH2148> of Benjamin, <WH1144> Jaasiel <WH3300> the son <WH1121> of Abner: <WH74>
Of Dan, <WH1835> Azareel <WH5832> the son <WH1121> of Jeroham. <WH3395> These <WH428> were the princes <WH8269> of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel. <WH3478>

But David <WH1732> took <WH5375> not <WH3808> the number <WH4557> of them from twenty years old <WH4480> <WH1121> <WH6242> <WH8141> and under: <WH4295> because <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> had said <WH559> he would increase <WH7235> <WH853> Israel <WH3478> like to the stars <WH3556> of the heavens. <WH8064>

Joab <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah <WH6870> began <WH2490> to number, <WH4487> but he finished <WH3615> not, <WH3808> because there fell <WH1961> wrath <WH7110> for it <WH2063> against <WH5921> Israel; <WH3478> neither <WH3808> was the number <WH4557> put <WH5927> in the account <WH4557> of the chronicles <WH1697> <WH3117> of king <WH4428> David. <WH1732>

And over <WH5921> the king's <WH4428> treasures <WH214> was Azmaveth <WH5820> the son <WH1121> of Adiel: <WH5717> and over <WH5921> the storehouses <WH214> in the fields, <WH7704> in the cities, <WH5892> and in the villages, <WH3723> and in the castles, <WH4026> was Jehonathan <WH3083> the son <WH1121> of Uzziah: <WH5818>
And over <WH5921> them that did <WH6213> the work <WH4399> of the field <WH7704> for tillage <WH5656> of the ground <WH127> was Ezri <WH5836> the son <WH1121> of Chelub: <WH3620>

And over <WH5921> the vineyards <WH3754> was Shimei <WH8096> the Ramathite: <WH7435> over <WH5921> the increase of the vineyards <WH7945> <WH3754> for the wine <WH3196> cellars <WH214> was Zabdi <WH2067> the Shiphmite: <WH8225>

And over <WH5921> the olive trees <WH2132> and the sycamore trees <WH8256> that <WH834> were in the low plains <WH8219> was Baal-hanan <WH1177> the Gederite: <WH1451> and over <WH5921> the cellars <WH214> of oil <WH8081> was Joash: <WH3135>

And over <WH5921> the herds <WH1241> that fed <WH7462> in Sharon <WH8289> was Shitrai <WH7861> the Sharonite: <WH8290> and over <WH5921> the herds <WH1241> that were in the valleys <WH6010> was Shaphat <WH8202> the son <WH1121> of Adlai: <WH5724>
Over <WH5921> the camels <WH1581> also was Obil <WH179> the Ishmaelite: <WH3458> and over <WH5921> the asses <WH860> was Jehdeiah <WH3165> the Meronothite: <WH4824>

And over <WH5921> the flocks <WH6629> was Jaziz <WH3151> the Hagerite. <WH1905> All <WH3605> these <WH428> were the rulers <WH8269> of the substance <WH7399> which <WH834> was king <WH4428> David's. <WH1732>

Also Jonathan <WH3083> David's <WH1732> uncle <WH1730> was a counselor, <WH3289> a wise <WH995> man, <WH376> and a scribe: <WH5608> and Jehiel <WH3171> the son <WH1121> of Hachmoni <WH2453> was with <WH5973> the king's <WH4428> sons: <WH1121>
And Ahithophel <WH302> was the king's <WH4428> counselor: <WH3289> and Hushai <WH2365> the Archite <WH757> was the king's <WH4428> companion: <WH7453>
And after <WH310> Ahithophel <WH302> was Jehoiada <WH3077> the son <WH1121> of Benaiah, <WH1141> and Abiathar: <WH54> and the general <WH8269> of the king's <WH4428> army <WH6635> was Joab. <WH3097>
